DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial evaluate safety immunogenicity 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age , 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Objectives : - To describe safety 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone Quadrivalent Fluzone Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age safety 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . Observational objective : - To describe immunogenicity 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® Intradermal vaccine adult 18 < 65 year age immunogenicity 2014-2015 formulation Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone ®High-Dose vaccine adult ≥ 65 year age . - To evaluate compliance , term immunogenicity , study vaccine ( Fluzone® Quadrivalent , Fluzone® Intradermal , Fluzone® High-Dose ) applicable age group historical requirement Committee Human Medicinal Products ( CHMP ) Note Guidance ( NfG ) CPMP/BWP/214/96 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Fluzone® Quadrivalent , Fluzone® Intradermal , Fluzone® High-Dose , Influenza Vaccines Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Adults 18 < 65 year age randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive either Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® Intradermal vaccine . Adults ≥ 65 year age also randomly assign 1:1 ratio receive either Fluzone® Quadrivalent Fluzone® High-Dose vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Subject ≥ 18 year age day inclusion . Informed consent form sign date . Able attend schedule visit comply trial procedure . History serious adverse reaction influenza vaccine . Receipt vaccine within 30 day receive study vaccine , plan receive another vaccine Visit 2 . Participation another interventional clinical trial investigate vaccine , drug , medical device , medical procedure 30 day precede first study vaccination course study , unless intervention study occur within 30 day prior first study vaccination none plan subject would complete safety surveillance present study . Receipt immune globulin , blood , bloodderived product past 3 month . Any condition opinion Investigator would pose health risk subject enrol could interfere evaluation vaccine . Personal history GuillainBarré syndrome . Known suspected congenital acquire immunodeficiency ; receipt immunosuppressive therapy , anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy , within precede 6 month ; longterm systemic corticosteroid therapy ( prednisone equivalent 2 consecutive week within past 3 month ) . Chronic illness , opinion Investigator , stage might interfere trial conduct completion . Seropositivity human immunodeficiency virus , hepatitis B , hepatitis C , report subject . Deprived freedom administrative court order , emergency setting , hospitalize involuntarily . Current alcohol drug addiction , opinion Investigator , might interfere ability comply trial procedure .
